func.title: PV_KeyFrames

param.name: smoothing
param.desc: Smoothing of the curve. 0 means linear interpolation.

param.name: position1
param.desc: Age of the particle in per-mille (0 to 1000) where value1 will be returned.

param.name: position2
param.desc: Age of the particle in per-mille (0 to 1000) where value2 will be returned.

param.name: position3
param.desc: Age of the particle in per-mille (0 to 1000) where value3 will be returned.

param.name: position4
param.desc: Age of the particle in per-mille (0 to 1000) where value4 will be returned.

func.desc: The value returned will be an interpolated value of the (smoothed) curve between the up to 4 key frames. PV_KeyFrames(0, 0, X, 1000, Y) is equivalent to PV_Linear(X, Y).
func.remark: See the particle documentation for further explanations of the particle system.
